item.title: Presentations
item.description: Idea 2024 [2024] Idea Proposal Lab Meeting 2024 [Jul 10, 2024] Why are Visually-Grounded Language Models Bad at Image Classification [May 16, 2024] Hierarchical Open-vocabulary Universal Image Segmentation [Apr 16, 2024] GLaMM: Pixel Grounding Large Multimodal Model [Mar 12, 2024] Improved Zero-shot Classification by Adapting VLMs with Text Descriptions [Jan 30, 2024] Classification based on Boxes and Phrases (Research Project) 2023
